resources.string:
Hi, my name is Gábor. 

I like to imagine the world as a simulation or in other words as God's dream. 

It makes life easier and facilitates learning different multi-paradigm programming languages. 

It also pops up the question: "Are we human? Or are we dancer?" /The Killers/ 

I doubt we'll ever know the answer with human logic. But anyway, life is a good game. 

*
*
*
*
* 

I just insert some more text here to see that the scrolling works. 

Fantastic!
